page.title: 11Education.Hoo area
page.content: There are no state schools in the area those at Brandeston & Kettleburgh being closed some years ago.Children rising 5 to 11+ go to one of two County Primary schools.Those living in Brandeston and Kettleburgh are transported by Education Authority 'bus to Easton where Letheringham children may also go.Children from Hoo go to Charsfield & those in Monewden may attend Charsfield or Earl Soham. From the age of 11+ all children being educated in the state system attend the Thomas Mills High School in Framlingham and are able to use the school 'bus. There is one fee-paying school in the area at Brandeston which is the preparatory school for Framlingham College.
